[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=envelope-from.txt
actions=envelope-recipient-accept;envelope-recipient-ok;data

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;accept;--envelope-recipient;accept@example.com

[client10027]
port=10027
arguments=--action;accept;--envelope-recipient;accept@example.com

[envelope-recipient-accept]
command=rcpt

recipient=accept@example.com

response=envelope-recipient
n_received=2
status=accept

recipients=accept@example.com;accept@example.com

[envelope-recipient-ok]
command=rcpt

recipient=ok@example.com

response=envelope-recipient
n_received=0
no_command_received=true
status=accept

recipients=;;

[data]
command=data

response=data
n_received=0
no_command_received=true
status=accept
